name: Erte Elegance Dress Up
description:
Flowing gowns, art deco decadence, pearls and feathers!
A dress up game with historical class.

A doll maker inspired by the works of Romain de Tirtoff (known by Erté), celebrated Russian-born French artist and designer. The maker embodies his love of draping and intricate details. Re-create the famous works of Erté, or put your own spin on these Art Deco period inspired looks. This concept was entirely inkscribble's idea. Until she suggested the theme, I had never before heard of Erté. But when I started researching his work I recognized a lot of pieces, I just didn't know they were all by one man. Needless to say I fell in love and this has been one of the most inspiring games to work on! Working on art deco dresses and accessories, as re-imagined by inkscribble was an absolute joy. And now the dress up brings art deco fashions to your mobile phone :)
